comment: Teri kya aukat hai Mandir ke bhik khane wale bhikari avlad
amr:
# ::snt Teri kya aukat hai Mandir ke bhik khane wale bhikari avlad
(a / and
      :op1 (h / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Teri")))
      :op2 (h2 / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (a2 / aukat))
      :op3 (h3 / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Mandir")))
      :op4 (h4 / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (b / bhik))
      :op5 (h5 / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (b2 / bhik))
      :op6 (h6 / have-mod-91
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Avlad"))))

# ::snt Swarna madarchod hai rahege
(m / madarchod
      :mod (c / country
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Swarna"))
      :mod (h / hai-ha
            :mode expressive))
